sections.title: Team mission
sections.content: The Rockvale Robotics team designs and constructs robotics for the BEST Robotics competition.

sections.title: Community outreach
sections.content:
The Rockvale Robotics team actively particpates in community outreach efforts. These efforts include:

  • Reading to elementary school students

  • Replacing incandescent bulbs with LEDS for low-income residents
